sentence.Network_en: French artist and inventor of the daguerreotype process for obtaining positive photographic prints.
sentence.Network_cn: 达盖尔,路易斯·雅克·曼德1789-1851法国艺术家和发明家,发明了银版摄影术,能洗出照片的正画来.

sentence.Network_en: The inventor of the daguerreotype is a French artist.
sentence.Network_cn: 银版照相的发明者是位法国艺术家。

sentence.Network_en: Daguerre: French artist and inventor of the daguerreotype process for obtaining positive photographic prints.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French daguerréotype, named after L.-J.-M. Daguerre,its French inventor

means.word_mean: 1. a photograph made by an early photographic process; the image was produced on a silver plate sensitized to iodine and developed in mercury vapor

sentences.en: French artist and inventor of the daguerreotype process for obtaining positive photographic prints.
sentences.cn: 达盖尔，路易斯·雅克·曼德1789－1851法国艺术家和发明家，发明了银版摄影术，能洗出照片的正画来。
